story.quote_start: "Manual migrations are the last frontier of technical debt.
story.quote_highlight: We're here to bridge that gap.
story.p1_start: After years in the trenches, I realized there was a missing link:
story.p1_highlight: the database is always a step behind.
story.p1_end: Manually tracing schema changes is prone to human error and production catastrophes. As systems scale, the risks grow exponentially.
story.p2_start: The Andb was born from a radical philosophy: 'Deep before Wide'. Before we expand to every database, we must master one. I asked myself:
story.p2_quote: "Can we bring the rigor of Git to the database layer?"
story.p3_end: the industry-standard orchestration engine. It restores absolute trust and visibility to your DDL management.
story.milestone_note_2025: 2025 Milestone — From CLI only to a Solid UI

journey.title: The Journey
journey.subtitle: From a frustrated backend developer's idea to a complete ecosystem.
journey.m1_desc: Transitioning from a personal tool to a commercial-grade ecosystem. Rebranding to @the-andb and implementing the 'Deep Strategy' for MySQL Mastery.
journey.m2_desc: Beyond the CLI. Developed a high-performance desktop interface with dynamic visualization, real-time diffing, and premium aesthetics.
journey.m3_desc: After one too many data-loss incidents caused by schema mismatches, the question was born: 'If code has Git, why doesn't the database?'
journey.m3_quote: Deep before Wide. Precision is the focus.
